de.thinktel.foragingBee.masonGlue
Interface IIterationAgent

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMovingAgent, Bee, FoodSource, Hive, HiveEntrance, Obstacle
public interface IIterationAgent
extends sim.engine.Steppable

This interface provides information for the simulation environment for accessing the scheduler for calling the interation method of this agent.

Author:
hoehne
